attributes.additional_details: So many of our country men die every year in Afganhistan because our Government refuses to try and come to a peaceful negotiation. I would like the government to stop sending our troops out, pulling the UK from the war. They should talk to other contries involved in the war, and try to get them to pull out as well. We should send a negotiator over there to try and come to a peacful end with this horrible war.
